description: The passionate team running this airstream trailer is serving some incredibly tasty Kosher cuisine with a Southern twist, and the foodies of Nashville just can’t quit craving all the flavorful dishes from Aryeh’s Kitchen. Having been welcomed with open arms, this sleek trailer has settled onto the campus of Vanderbilt University, serving the hungry students and passers-by their divinely delicious offerings.Their incredible menu includes Southern Chix & Waffles (pecan crusted fried chicken and golden waffles with Aryeh’s own Georgia peach reduction and spiced maple syrup), Top Katz’s (hot pastrami on rye, pumpernickel, and hand-ground beer mustard), Latkes with Apple Chutney, Minted Watermelon Citrus Fruit Salad, and much more. For scrumptious food that fulfills your palate and spirit, Aryeh’s Kitchen is the "truck" you must visit.
name: Aryeh's Kitchen
